snoopy.blindnote: 2009年6月17日（山元）snoRNABaseより。Homo sapiens ACA46 snoRNA This H/ACA box RNA was cloned by Kiss et al. (2004) from a HeLa cell extract immunoprecipitated with an anti-GAR1 antibody. It is predicted to guide the pseudouridylation of residue U649 of 18S rRNA. The pseudouridylation of this residue was experimentally confirmed by primer extension mapping by Kiss et al. (2004). ACA46 and ACA50 share the same host gene (KIAA1007). (20100622末安)UCSCを参考にgenomic positionを変更した,NCBIがアクセスできないためaccession Noは保留,evidenceはsnoRNAbaseのレファレンスから抜粋。 (20100623末安)accession Noを加えた。
snoopy.evidence: Kiss, A. M., Jady, B. E., Bertrand, E., and Kiss, T. (2004). Human box H/ACA pseudouridylation guide RNA machinery. Mol. Cell .Biol. 24, 5797-5807.
